charges.charge_disposition: Defendant committed to the custody of BOP for 188 months, 188 months on count 1, 188 months on count 2 and 120 months on count 3 to be served concurrently, recommend incarceration at Sheridan, Oregon, recommend participation in residential sex offender treatment, recommend 500 hour residential drug treatment program, supervised release for the balance of his life on counts 1,2, and 3 to be served concurrently, no crimes, no controlled substances including medical marijuana, no firearms, DNA collection, standard conditions 1-15; special conditions: participate in substance abuse testing in the amount of 200 UAs/breathalyzers/year -pay cost, participate in and complete program of substance abuse treatment -pay cost, complete sex offender treatment program -pay cost, employment must be approved in advance, 3rd party disclosure, may not reside in home with a child under the age of 18, not near schools, playgrounds, parks; not date anyone with child under the age of 18, no sexually explicit materials, no 900 numbers, no computer with online computer service without approval, allow computer to be examined by USPO, USPO to install software restricting computer, no encryption software, provide passwords to USPO, sign releases for access to phone, wireless, internet including Cloud, sex offender registration, submit to searches, warn others, no camera phones, no alcohol, no bars, no police scanner, not use medical marijuana, no contact with victims, no fine, restitution in the amount of $31,400 at a rate of 10% of gross income, special assessment of $300, interest waived on restitution, forfeit computers and DVD

Defendant committed to the custody of BOP for 188 months, 188 months on count 1, 188 months on count 2 and 120 months on count 3 to be served concurrently, recommend incarceration at Sheridan, Oregon, recommend participation in residential sex offender treatment, recommend 500 hour residential drug treatment program, supervised release for the balance of his life on counts 1,2, and 3 to be served concurrently, no crimes, no controlled substances including medical marijuana, no firearms, DNA collection, standard conditions 1-15; special conditions: participate in substance abuse testing in the amount of 200 UAs/breathalyzers/year -pay cost, participate in and complete program of substance abuse treatment -pay cost, complete sex offender treatment program -pay cost, employment must be approved in advance, 3rd party disclosure, may not reside in home with a child under the age of 18, not near schools, playgrounds, parks; not date anyone with child under the age of 18, no sexually explicit materials, no 900 numbers, no computer with online computer service without approval, allow computer to be examined by USPO, USPO to install software restricting computer, no encryption software, provide passwords to USPO, sign releases for access to phone, wireless, internet including Cloud, sex offender registration, submit to searches, warn others, no camera phones, no alcohol, no bars, no police scanner, not use medical marijuana, no contact with victims, no fine, restitution in the amount of $31,400 at a rate of 10% of gross income, special assessment of $300, interest waived on restitution, forfeit computers and DVD
